4318950.name: City of Hunger
4318950.description:
City of Hunger is a virtual reality survival horror game inspired by classic 90s horror titles.

A parasitic outbreak has transformed the city’s inhabitants into violent, aggressive creatures. After a failed special operation, you are left isolated and injured, forced to survive while moving through dark streets and abandoned houses until rescue arrives.

The game focuses on immersive VR combat, exploration, and tension-driven survival. Resources are limited, enemies are dangerous, and every encounter must be handled carefully.

Key Features

  • First-person survival horror in virtual reality

  • Visceral VR combat using heavy firearms

  • Infected enemies that react aggressively to player presence

  • Dark urban environments, including streets and indoor locations

  • Atmospheric sound design, where noise can attract danger

  • Linear progression, focused on survival and reaching extraction

Inspired by classic survival horror games of the 1990s, City of Hunger emphasizes tension, immersion, and constant threat rather than fast-paced action.

Survive the City of Hunger.

Heavy weapons, visceral combat in virtual reality, and a suffocating atmosphere where every sound could be your last.

Face your fears in this action-horror game inspired by the classic survival horrors of the 90s.

Survive the City of Hunger.
4318950.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
